column5: Do any of you have any suggestions for good dealers in BC, AB or SK? Will hopefully be buying next Spring and I am willing to drive a bit to find a good deal. I've tried e-mailing some of the dealers listed on the Lund site, but all but one have not contacted me back. Is this normal?
I have had good luck at kevins marine in sask fort qu'appllei think his # is 332 5888:-)
you can try www.canadatrader.com click on boats type in lund and the province you wish to search.you will find private sales and dealers advertise as well.
Thanks for the info guys. It's amazing how many people will not even contact you after you send them an e-mail saying that you are interested in buying in the next 6-8 months.
